original_title: New State Minister of Plantation Industries and Mahaweli Development appointed
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna (SLPP) Parliamentarian Lohan Ratwatte has been sworn in as the new State Minister of Plantation Industries and Mahaweli Development before President Ranil Wickremesinghe.
He was sworn in to the position at the Presidential Secretariat, a short while ago, according to the President’s Media Division (PMD).
